entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Snow beginning early this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 26. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
